name: BOT POP!
description: DELABOT needs to recharge after a long year of online learning!  Make sure he gets all the juice he needs to be bright-eyed and bushy-tailed for the 2022-2023 school year!  If the electricity (bubbles) flows to the top, his circuits are fried.  Use the arrow keys to move about and the Z button on your keyboard to begin!  And don't forget to declare those enrollment intentions for 2022-2023--Only 3 weeks left!  The last day of school is June 3, 2022.
